titleStmt.title: His Maiesties reason vvhy he cannot in conscience consent to abolish the Episcopall government. Delivered by him in writing to the Divines that attend the Honorable Commissioners of Parliament at the Treaty at Newport Octob. 2. 1648. With the answer of the said Divines delivered to His Majestie in writing. October 3. 1648.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Marshall, Stephen, 1594?-1655.
Vines, Richard, 1600?-1656.
Seaman, Lazarus, d. 1675.
Caryl, Joseph, 1602-1673.
Westminster Assembly (1643-1652)

notesStmt.note: The Divines are Stephen Marshall, Richard Vines, Joseph Caryl and Lazarus Seaman. Cf. Thomason Catalogue.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "8ber [i.e. October] ye 9th".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
